name: 100 Seconds to Midnight (Sam Wain - Sound Designer & Composer, randomnes, Morgan Allen, substain)
name_original: 100 Seconds to Midnight (Sam Wain - Sound Designer & Composer, randomnes, Morgan Allen, substain)
description:
At doom’s doorstep: the clock is set at 100 seconds to midnight. 

You are the leader of your people and you have a dream about your future, it's glorious. But, there is suffering on the horizon, brought about by the torments  of human existence.  The fate of your people is in your hands, your decisions will shape history itself. Go and decide your future.  

Play our government simulator and try to prevent your country from the ever present dangers of our modern world. 

Credits:

Morgan Allen - programming and design

Substain - programming and UI

Sam Wain - music 

Randomness - Art and UI
